name: Waterdeep
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Waterdeep.

name: Menzoberranzan
text: Can be played at any time. Immune to flyers.

name: Zhentil Keep
text: Zhentil Keep can defend itself as a level 5 cleric.

name: Shadowdale
text: Any champion can cast cleric and wizard spells when defending Shadowdale.

name: Moonshae Isles
text: The Moonshaes can defend themselves as a level 2 hero. All defending allies gain 3 levels.

name: Thay
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Thay.

name: Pirate Isles
text: Flyers cannot attack this realm.

name: Ravens Bluff
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Ravens Bluff.

name: The Great Rift
text: Flyers cannot attack this realm.

name: Myth Drannor
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Myth Drannor. Increases player's maximum hand by one.

name: Jungles of Chult
text: Chult can defend itself as a level 5 monster.

name: Sword Coast
text: The defending player can return one ally to his hand after each round of battle.

name: Anauroch
text: All attackers lose one level.

name: Impiltur
text: All champions and allies who defend Impiltur gain 1 level.

name: Icewind Dale
text: The attacking champion must discard one magical item chosen by the defender.

name: The High Moor
text: Any defending monster gains 4 levels.

name: Damara
text: Double the level of a defending Forgotten Realms champion.

name: Dragonspear Castle
text: All allies of a defending monster gain 2 levels.

name: Daggerdale
text: Allies cannot be used when attacking this realm.

name: Darkhold
text: All defenders of Darkhold gain 2 levels if Zhentil Keep is in play anywhere.

name: Haunted Hall of Eveningstar
text: Draw one card and place it in your hand when this realm is played or rebuilt.

name: Evermeet
text: Any champion can use wiizard spells when defending Evermeet. Flyers cannot attack.

name: Berdusk
text: A wizard or cleric gains 3 levels when defending the attached realm.

name: Tantras
text: No spells can be cast when attacking or defending Tantras.

name: Mulmaster
text: Draw another card every time a spell card is played.

name: Hillsfar
text: Any champion gains 3 levels when defending the attached realm.

name: Suzail
text: Any champion can cast wizard spells when defending the attached realm. If attached to Cormyr, all defenders also gain 4 levels.

name: Arabel
text: The attached realm can defend itself as a level 4 monster.

name: Fortifications
text: Each defender of the attached realm gains 2 levels.

name: Fortifications
text: Each defender of the attached realm gains 3 levels.

name: Selune
text: Undead cannot attack the attached realm.

name: Peasant Militia
text: Each champion and ally attacking the attached realm loses 1 level.

name: Alias the Sell-Sword
text: Immune to offensive spells.

name: King Azoun IV
text: All allies of King Azoun IV gain 1 level.

name: Maligor the Red
text: Once per battle Maligor can shift one opposing ally to his own side.

name: Elminster the Mage
text: Immune to offensive spells.

name: Drizzt Do' Urden
text: When defending, Drizzt must be defeated twice in one battle before he is discarded.

name: Midnight, Goddess of Magic
text: If only one Midnight is in play, wizards cannot cast spells without her permission. She also destroys all magical items held by the opposing champion.

name: Torg Mac Cei, the Ironlord
text: Torg's level is doubled when defending or attacking the Great Rift.

name: The Pereghost
text: All the pereghost's allies gain 2 levels.

name: Bruenor Battlehammer
text: Bruenor gains 2 levels when fighting a monster.

name: Marco Volo
text: At the start of the player's turn, he can look at the top card of any draw pile and discard it if he wants.

name: The Harpers
text: The Harpers can cast wizard and cleric spells, but the player must choose one type (wizard or cleric) in each battle when this card is used.

name: Adventurers!
text: Can use cleric and wizard spells.

name: Crime Lord
text: The Crime Lord can also be played as an event to destroy one holding. The destroyed holding and the Crime Lord are discarded.

name: Adventurers
text: All allies of these adventurers gain 1 level.

name: The Jotunslayers
text: The Jotunslayers are level 8 if the opposing champion is a monster.

name: Myrmidons
text: When the myrmidons are discarded, the player shuffles all discards back into the draw deck.

name: Pteranadon
text: The Pteranadon gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

name: Gorgosaurus
text: The Gorgosaurus gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

name: Greater Feyr
text: The first enemy ally played against the feyr in each battle is discarded immediately.

name: Cleric of Mask
text: This card and attached magical items and artifact are kept face down, and revealed only in battle.

name: Drow Matron
text: The drow matron gains 3 levels when defending Menzoberranzan.

name: Dracolich
text: Can use wizard spells. Undead. Flyer.

name: Vasos Flameslayer
text: Vasos gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

name: Allisa of the Mist
text: Allisa gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

name: Worden Ironfist
text: Worden gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

name: Amarill
text: If Amarill is defeated, the player can pull one other champion from his discards and return it to his hand.

name: Joliet the Rash
text: Once in play, must attack on the player's turn, every turn, or be discarded.

name: Dwarf of Earthfast
text: Gains 4 levels if the opposing champion is a monster.

name: The Black Courser
text: The Black Courser's level is 8 when fighting dragons or undead.

name: Mind Flayer
text: When played, the mind flayer can immediately shift one opposing ally to its own side for that round of battle. The ally loses 1 level.

name: Noble Djinni
text: The opponent cannot play flyers this round and all opposing flyers already in the battle are discarded.

name: Hubadai
text: Flyer.

name: Intellect Devourer
text: Immediately destroys an opposing champion of level 5 or less. Count only magical item and artifact bonuses when determining level.

name: Shandrill
text: Immune to offensive spells.

name: Triceratops
text: Triceratops gains 6 levels when defending Chult.

name: Cleric of Malar
text: This cleric gains 2 levels when attacking realms from outside the Forgotten Realms.

name: Airship
text: Destroys any two allies, chosen by this card's player.

name: Bad Omens
text: All allies and champions lose one level until the player's next turn.

name: Fortunate Omens
text: All allies gain 3 levels until the player's next turn.

name: Rod of Shapechange
text: Select any champion from the discard pile and use it in battle in place of this champion. After winning the battle, this champion and artifact return to the pool; the substitute is discarded.

name: Dwarven Hammer
text: (Off)

name: Staff of Striking
text: The bonus becomes +5 levels if attached to a cleric. (Off)

name: Horrors of the Abyss
text: (Off/4)

name: Flameblade
text: (Off)

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
text: (Off)

name: Cataclysm!
text: Destroys one realm of the player's choice; that realm is discarded.

name: Good Fortune
text: The player of this card draws five cards immediately.

name: Surprise Raid
text: This player's champion and allies are doubled in levels for one round of battle.

name: Banner of the One-Eyed God
text: All of this champion's allies gain 1 level. (Def)

name: Viperhand
text: Any champion with the Viperhand can cast wizard spells. (Def)

name: Orb of Doom
text: (Off)

name: Staff of Conjuring
text: (Off)

name: Spell of Formless Horror
text: Cast on opposing champion to reduce its level by 3. Spell remains until dispelled. (Off/4)

name: Safe Harbor!
text: Every player can immediately rebuild one razed realm.

name: Labor of Legend
text: One razed realm is rebuilt by a champion from the player's pool; the champion is discarded.

name: Wand of Light
text: (Off)

name: The Free City of Greyhawk
text: Any champion defending Greyhawk can cast cleric and wizard spells.

name: The Lands of Iuz
text: Any champion defending the Lands of Iuz can cast wizard spells. All defenders gain 3 levels if anyone has Iuz in play.

name: The Pomarj
text: A monster defending the Pomarj gains 3 levels.

name: Hold of the Sea Princes
text: This realm can defend itself as a level 1 champion.

name: Blackmoor
text: All magical items and artifacts defending Blackmoor gain 2 levels.

name: Sterich
text: Any monster defending Sterich gains 5 levels.

name: Veluna
text: Any champion defending Veluna can use cleric spells.

name: The Great Kingdom
text: No undead can attack the Great Kingdom. The player's maximum hand increases by two.

name: Temple of Elemental Evil
text: Draw three cards immediately when the temple is played.

name: Greyhawk Ruins
text: All Greyhawk champions of this player gain 2 levels.

name: The Bright Desert
text: Cannot be attacked by heroes.

name: The Bone March
text: Heroes cannot be played in defense of this realm.

name: The Sea Barons
text: Any holding attached to the Great Kingdom also applies to this realm.

name: Bissel
text: Any champion can use cleric spells while defending Bissel.

name: The Scarlet Brotherhood
text: Player can eliminate one champion from any pool at the start of his turn. This realm is then razed.

name: Irongate
text: Any defending hero gains 4 levels.

name: Burneal Forest
text: Any champion and allies who attack Burneal Forest lose 2 levels.

name: Castle Hart
text: Any champion and allies defending Castle Hart gain 2 levels.

name: Arms of the Horned Society
text: The attached realm can defend itself as a level 5 hero.

name: Arms of Iuz
text: Any champion defending the attached realm can cast cleric spells.

name: Arms of Greyhawk
text: No Greyhawk realms with holdings, of any player, can be attacked by monsters or flyers.

name: Arms of the Great Kingdom
text: All undead allies of this player are doubled in level, whether attacking or defending.

name: Arms of Furyondy
text: The attached realm is unaffected by all harmful event cards.

name: Arms of Nyrond
text: Monsters cannot attack the attached realm.

name: Skull Keep
text: Any champion defending the attached realm gains 4 levels.

name: Fortification
text: The attached realm and all its defenders are immune to offensive wizard and cleric spells.

name: Siege!
text: Razes the first realm of every player, regardless of special powers; if a player's first realm is already razed, he ignores this event.

name: War Banner
text: Every champion and ally of this player gains 1 level. (Def)

name: Codex of the Infinite Planes
text: All of this player's champions are immune to offensive magical items and spells. (Def)

name: Crystal of the Ebon Flame
text: The champion who holds this crystal must attack on his turn or be discarded. (Off)

name: Skeletal Horde
text: Undead.

name: Eye and Hand of Vecna
text: The attached champion gains 5 levels when attacking, 2 when defending.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
text: This player's Greyhawk realms and their defenders cannot be attacked by dragons or monsters.

name: Baba Yaga's Hut
text: The attached champion and all its allies are all considered flyers.

name: Chariot of Lyrx
text: The attached champion gains 3 levels and becomes a flyer; all allies can also fly.

name: Cup of Al'Akbar
text: If the player discards three cards from his hand at the end of his turn, he can return any one card from the discard pile to his hand.

name: Rary the Traitor
text: Rary gains 3 levels when fighting a wizard and/or 3 levels when defending a realm with an attached holding.

name: Otto
text: Otto can cast both wizard and cleric spells.

name: Mika the Wolf-Nomad
text: Mika gains 3 levels when the opponent uses allies against him.

name: Lolth, the Spider Queen
text: Lolth can cast both wizard and cleric spells. If Lolth is defeated, shuffle her back into the draw deck.

name: Iuz the Evil
text: Iuz can cast wizard spells. If defeated, Iuz forces one razed enemy realm to be discarded, or razes one realm.

name: Mutiny!
text: No battles can be fought until the player's next turn. A battle in progress stops immediately with no victor; allies are discarded.

name: Swordwraith
text: Undead.

name: Sysania
text: Flyer.

name: Kiara
text: Kiara can destroy one magical item being used against her. The affected item is discarded.

name: Hettman Tsurin
text: If Hettman does not attack, at the end of his turn the player can randomly draw one card from another player's hand and discard it.

name: Griffon
text: The attached champion becomes a flyer. (Def)

name: Sea Zombie
text: Undead.

name: Mist Wolf
text: No allies can be played until this player's next turn. Allies in play are discarded immediately.

name: Tyrinon
text: Flyer.

name: Quagmiela the Dragon
text: Flyer.

name: Seragrimm the Just
text: Undead. Seragrimm can only defend, but never attack.

name: Skulk
text: This player can now play allies face down; their value is not revealed until both players pass and the winner is determined.

name: Berserk Fury!
text: All heroes gain 5 levels until the current player's next turn.

name: Wolf Nomads
text: The nomads gain 2 levels if Mika is in the player's pool.

name: Thorvid
text: Thorvid gains 3 levels when fighting monsters, undead, or flyers.

name: Fairy Madness
text: Fairy madness affects one champion (not currently in battle). That champion is turned face down and cannot be used until after its next turn.

name: Young Gold Dragon
text: Flyer. The Dragon can use wizard spells.

name: Arch-Druid
text: If only one arch-druid is in play, clerics cannot cast spells without his permission.

name: Hell Hound
text: All cards friendly to the hell hound are immune to fireball spells.

name: Griffin
text: Flyer.

name: Giant Skeleton
text: Undead. Any magic sword or spear used by the opposing champion must be discarded immediately.

name: Skeleton
text: Undead.

name: Winged Horror
text: Flyer.

name: Treants of the Grandwood
text: The treants and all cards in the player's force are immune to all offensive wizard spells except fireball.

name: Magical Barding
text: (Def)

name: Border Forts
text: Only flyers can attack the attached realm.

name: Ren's Crystal Ball
text: At the beginning of his turn, the owner of Ren's Crystal Ball can inspect the top three cards of any deck and discard one.

name: Falcon Figurine
text: (Off)

name: Transformation!
text: All players must discard their hands immediately and draw five cards.

name: Enslaved!
text: All players must discard one champion from their pool.

name: Siege
text: All players must discard one realm from their front rank. The next realm played must go into the front position.

name: Bribery!
text: Play immediately after champions are selected. The bribed champion returns to the owner's pool and that player must select another champion or lose the battle.

name: Charge!
text: All of this player's champions gain 3 levels until the end of the player's next turn.

name: Magic Sword
text: +5 vs. undead. (Off)

name: Enlarge
text: Champion can attack flyers with an additional +3. (Def/4)

name: Ring of Shooting Stars
text: Hero can 'lend' +1 to a champion in a combat where he is not involved. (Off)

name: Arms of Veluna
text: Resurrect one ally which just participated in successful defense of the realm. Resurrected card returns to hand.

name: Fast Talking!
text: Everyone is convinced all artifacts and magical items in play no longer work. All players discard all magical items and artifacts.

name: Flight
text: Champion and all allies become flyers for this battle. (Def/4)

name: Shapechange
text: (Def/4)

name: Barbarian Raiders!
text: All players must discard one realm, either from their hand or from the table.

name: Treasure Fleet
text: All players draw three cards.

name: Potion of Fire-Breathing
text: Discard after one use. (Off)

name: Arms of the Shield Lands
text: Attach this holding to a razed Greyhawk realm to rebuild it instantly.

name: Net of Entrapment
text: This champion's opponent cannot play allies. (Off)

name: Johydee's Mask
text: The wearer assumes the level or gains the special power (but not both) of any champion in play.

name: Helm of Teleportation
text: One other champion (belonging to the same player) can join this champion as an ally. That champion returns to the pool after this round but cannot be used again this battle. (Def)

name: Rod of Dispel Magic
text: A champion with this rod can cancel one magic spell when attacking or defending.

name: Draj
text: Nonflying attackers lose 2 levels.

name: Raam
text: All defenders of this realm gain 1 level.

name: Urik
text: Allies cannot be played to attack Urik. Urik can defend itself as a level 4 champion.

name: Tyr
text: Owner draws one extra card per turn. Tyr can defend itself as a level 5 hero.

name: Gulg
text: The first ally to attack Gulg itself each battle is destroyed. Gulg can defend itself as a level 7 hero.

name: Nibenay
text: This card is not flipped face down unless Nibenay is razed twice in a row.

name: Balic
text: All attacking allies are halved (round up). Balic can defend itself as a level 4 hero.

name: The Mud Palace
text: The Mud Palace increases hand size by two cards.

name: North Ledopolus
text: One card can be drawn and played immediately in defense of the attached realm.

name: South Ledopolus
text: The attached realm can use any ally as a champion. The ally is still discarded after the battle.

name: Altaruk
text: Any champion defending the attached realm can cast cleric spells.

name: Salt Veiw
text: Monsters cannot attack the attached realm.

name: Ogo
text: Any champion and allies attacking the attached realm lose one level for fear of Ogo's cannibal halflings.

name: Makla
text: Makla adds 1 level to all defenders of the attached realm.

name: Kalidnay
text: Any monster defending the attached realm gains 4 levels.

name: Arkhold
text: Allows owner to draw one extra card per turn.

name: Salt View
text: Defending champion gains 2 levels.

name: Waverly
text: The attached realm cannot be attacked by flyers and spells cannot be used against its defenders.

name: Bodach
text: A champion attacking the attached realm can have only one ally.

name: Giustenal
text: A champion attacking the attached realm cannot play more than three allies per round.

name: Yaramuke
text: Poisoned water destroys one of the attacker's allies as it is played (defender's choice).

name: Lost Oasis
text: The owner can draw one card and play it immediately when the attached realm is attacked.

name: Grak's Pool
text: The oasis acts as a permanent +5 ally to any champion who defends the attached realm.

name: Silver Spring
text: If the attached realm is razed, one other opponent's realm of the defender's choice is razed also.

name: Bitter Well
text: This oasis destroys any flyers that attack the attached realm.

name: Black Waters
text: No were-creature or monsters can attack any realm held by this player.

name: Fort Melidor
text: Allies defending every Dark Sun realm held by this player gain 1 level.

name: Dungeon of Gulg
text: Any champion and allies attacking the attached realm lose 1 level.

name: Ziggurat
text: The level bonus (number in icon) of any wizard spell cast in defense of the attached realm is doubled.

name: Temple
text: The attached realm can cast cleric spells.

name: Mogadisho's Horde
text: If this card is on the losing side of a battle, all holdings of the opponent are discarded.

name: Assassins
text: If this card is on the losing side of the battle, it destroys one champion anywhere in play chosen by the losing player.

name: Rikus
text: Rikus can attack twice; if he wins his first round, he can attack again with new allies.

name: Agis
text: When attacking, can psionically destroy one monster in the defender's pool before battle begins.

name: Anavias
text: When attacking, psionically negates the power of all enemy holdings for the duration of battle.

name: Chividal
text: Chividal can psionically destroy one opposing ally at any point during the round.

name: Wind Dancers
text: All flyers in play are destroyed immediately.

name: Water Hunters
text: All undead in play are destroyed immediately.

name: Silver Hands
text: All champions killed in the last battle are restored to the players' pools. Play only after a battle is completely resolved.

name: Sky Singers
text: Destroys all magical items in play.

name: Cistern Fiend
text: Enemy allies cannot be used against this fiend.

name: Spirit of the land
text: Prevents one Dark Sun realm or holding from being razed or discarded, or restores one razed realm from any world. An attacker gets no spoils of victory and the battle is over.

name: Captain Kazhal
text: Destroys one magical item held by the opposing champion at any time during the battle round.

name: Dlasva
text: Dlasva can psionically destroy one opposing ally during a round of battle.

name: Tithian
text: If Tithian attacks and wins a round of battle, the defending realm is razed immediately.

name: Defiler
text: If the defiler casts one or more spells, one friendly realm is razed or one friendly holding is shuffled back into the draw pile.

name: Dragon King
text: Can cast wizard spells.

name: Borys
text: Can cast wizard and cleric spells.

name: Orb of Power
text: Offensive spells and magical items have no affect against the champion with this orb. (Def)

name: Ring of All Seeing
text: Allows the owning player, at the beginning of his turn, to look at one player's hand. (Def)

name: Treasure
text: All monsters are bribed to desert; discard all monsters in battle or in pools.

name: Shield of Destruction
text: (Def)

name: Shield of Annihilation
text: (Def)

name: Shield of Devastation
text: (Def)

name: Shield of Wickedness
text: One enemy ally, chosen by the shield's owner, is forced to switch sides and fight for the shield's owner for one round of battle. (Off)

name: Shield of Gore
text: (Off)

name: The Heartwood Spear
text: Kills any opposing dragon or monster in the battle automatically.

name: The Caravan
text: Play only between two player's turns. The player of this event can take a turn immediately. Afterward, play resumes where it left off.

name: The Necklace
text: Allows the attached champion to cast wizard spells.

name: Elemental Cleric
text: The elemental cleric is immune to offensive wizard spells.

name: The Outcast
text: Can use cleric or wizard spells.

name: Desert Warrior
text: The desert warrior's first ally each round is considered a +4, regardless of the ally's actual level.

name: Desert Warrior
text: The desert warrior's first ally each round is considered a +3, regardless of the ally's actual level.

name: Desert Warrior
text: All allies played on the desert warrior gain an additional +1.

name: Tembo
text: The opponent cannot use allies for defense or offense.

name: Fireball
text: Destroys immediately all opposing allies of level 4 or less. (Off/4)

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Immediately destroys one opposing ally of level 4 or less, or one magical item, of caster's choice. (Off/4)

name: Paralyze
text: Cast on a champion before battle to prevent that card from defending. Cast during a battle to eliminate one ally of the caster's choice. (Off/3/4)

name: Magic Missile
text: (Off/4)

name: Wall of Fire
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. (Off/4)

name: Wall of Iron
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. Use on defense only. (Def/4)

name: Wall of Stone
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. Use on defense only. (Def/4)

name: Wall of Force
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. (Def/4)

name: Invisibility
text: An invisible champion can bypass a defending hero (not a monster, wizard, or cleric) and destroy the realm. The defending hero returns to the pool. (Def/4)

name: Cone of Cold
text: (Off/4)

name: Sleep
text: Eliminates up to three opposing allies of level 1 or 2, chosen by the caster. (Off/4)

name: Shield
text: (Def/4)

name: Fly
text: One champion or ally becomes a flyer. (Def/4)

name: Crushing Fist
text: The crushing fist adds 4 levels or destroys one magical item, at the choice of the caster. (Off/4)

name: Anti-Magic Shell
text: Makes one champion immune to all offensive spells and prevents him from casting any spells himself. (Def/4)

name: Dispel Magic
text: Cancels the effect of any spell. (Def/3/4)

name: Improved Phantasmal Force
text: (Off/4)

name: Fear
text: Attach to any enemy champion in a pool; that card cannot attack or defend until the fear is dispelled. (Off/3)

name: Cure Light Wounds
text: (Def/4)

name: Cure Serious Wounds
text: (Def/4)

name: Sticks to Snakes
text: (Off/4)

name: Blade Barrier
text: Destroys all opposing allies of level 5 or less. Cast only when defending. (Off/4)

name: Bless
text: The champion and each of its allies gain 1 level this round. (Def/4)

name: Sanctuary
text: The cleric who casts sanctuary loses this round of battle but is not discarded; it returns to the pool instead. (Def/4)

name: Wind Walk
text: The champion and all his allies this round are treated as flyers. (Def/4)

name: Bark Skin
text: Adds 2 levels to a single defender. (Def/4)

name: Charm
text: Opponent loses one ally of the caster's choice, chosen immediately. (Off/4)

name: Dispel Magic
text: Cancels the effect of any spell. (Def/3/4)

name: Darkness
text: This battle ends immediately with no victor or loser; champions return to their pools, allies to the players' hands, spells are discarded. Darkness has no effect against monsters. (Def/4)

name: Protection
text: The opponent cannot use undead in this battle round; any already played as allies are discarded. An undead champion loses the battle but returns to the pool. (Def/4)

name: Chariot of Sustarre
text: One champion or two allies can fly for one round of battle. (Def/4)

name: Sunray
text: The sunray kills all undead in one player's pool. (Off/3)

name: Wall of Thorns
text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 3 or higher can cross the wall. (Def/4)

name: Wall of Fire
text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 4 or higher can cross the wall. (Off/4)

name: Holy Word
text: Destroys all undead allies on both sides of a battle instantly. (Off/4)

name: Raise Dead
text: Any one defeated champion can be selected from the player's discard pile and placed back in his hand. (Def/3/5)

name: Flame Strike
text: Destroys any number of opposing allies with levels totaling 6 or less, selected by the caster. Discard immediately. (Off/4)

name: Protection from Lightning
text: Lightning cannot harm the caster or his allies in this battle. (Def/4)

name: Silence
text: The opposing champion cannot cast any spells in this battle. (Off/4)

name: Invisibility to Undead
text: This champion ignores undead opponents.

name: Wall of Fog
text: No attacks are allowed against any player until the caster's next turn. (Off/3)

name: Forget
text: One ally 'forgets' to attack or defend this turn; discard the ally. (Off/4)

name: Web
text: Destroys any opposing allies of level 3 or less already in play. (Off/4)

name: Blink
text: A champion who is about to lose a round of battle escapes to the player's pool, but the battle is still lost. (Def/4)

name: Hold Undead
text: Opposing undead allies have no effect on the outcome of this battle. (Off/4)

name: Charm Monster
text: An opposing monster returns to its pool; the caster wins this round of battle. (Off/4)

name: Wind of Disenchantment
text: An anti-magic storm sweeps across the cosmos, destroying all magical items in play.

name: Black Tentacles
text: All champions of level 4 or less die, regardless of whether they are in battle or in pools. (Off/3/4)

name: Fire Shield
text: (Off/4)

name: Ice Storm
text: Destroys all champions and allies of level 4 or less in play anywhere.

name: Phantasmal Killer
text: The champion gains one level for each ally played against him. (Off/4)

name: Solid Fog
text: Unearthly fog prevents all attacks against all players until this player's next turn.

name: Animate Dead
text: A wizard who casts this spell can fight again in the next round of battle, regardless of whether he won or lost the previous round. (Def/4)

name: Cloudkill
text: Opposing allies of level 3 or less are discarded and no more can be played this round. (Off/4)

name: Feebleminded
text: An opposing spellcaster cannot cast any spells for the rest of this round. (Off/4)

name: Magic Jar
text: If the defender is defeated, the current attacking champion becomes the defending champion in the next round of this battle and then is discarded. (Off/4)

name: Faithful Hound
text: Only flyers can attack any realm until the player's next turn.

name: Passwall
text: Negates any wall spell. (Def/4)

name: Rock to Mud
text: Only flyers can attack this player's realms until the player's next turn. (Def/4)

name: Chain Lightning
text: (Off/4)

name: Death Fog
text: Kills all champions of level 5 or less in one player's pool and prevents survivors from attacking until after that player's next turn. (Off/3)

name: Death Spell
text: Kills any one champion or ally of the caster's choosing of level 7 or less. (Off/3/4)

name: Disintegrate
text: Destroy's one realm, regardless of position. The destroyed realm must be discarded. This player can make no attacks this turn. (Off/3)

name: Geas
text: The affected champion can neither attack nor defend until after the owner's next turn. (Off/3)

name: Banishment
text: Destroys one monster of the caster's choice. (Off/3/4)

name: Control Undead
text: The caster can ask any player for his largest undead ally card and use it in this round of battle. The ally is discarded afterward. (Off/4)

name: Finger of Death
text: Kills any one champion or ally of level 5 or less. (Off/4)

name: Spell Turning
text: Turns a just-cast spell back at its caster, as if the original target had cast it. (Def/3/4)

name: Ancient Curse
text: Choose one champion with an attached artifact or magical item to be killed immediately. Discard the champion and his possessions.

name: Calm
text: This magical calm undoes the harmful effect of an event, but only for the player of this card.

name: Discovery of Spellfire
text: The user can examine all other player's hands and discard one card from each.

name: Magical Champion
text: Attach this item to an ally from your hand. The ally becomes a champion (hero) until discarded for any reason. Its level is unchanged. (Def)

name: Traitor
text: One ally of this player's choice switches sides for the duration of this round.

name: Chaos Shield
text: A champion with this shield gains 1 level for every ally currently opposing him.

name: Slave Realm of Tunek
text: No cleric or wizard can attack this realm.

name: Phorbes's Scrolls
text: Besides adding 7 levels, the scrolls force the largest enemy ally played so far to be discarded. (Off/4)

name: Mercenary Gold
text: One opposing ally of level 1 or 2, chosen by this player, is discarded.

name: Living Scroll
text: The Living Scroll defeats a hero or cleric automatically. But it is automatically defeated by a wizard or monster.

name: Ren's Bell of Death
text: Allies of level 4 or higher cannot be used against the champion who carries Ren's Bell of Death.

name: The Labyrinth Map of Shuuc
text: A champion with this map is never discarded; if defeated, he escapes into the labyrinth and returns to the player's pool at the end of the player's next turn.

name: Annulus
text: At the beginning of its owner's turn, this helm of telepathy (fashioned from a mummified illithid's head) allows the player to examine an opponent's hand.

name: Scroll of 7 Leagues
text: The possessor of this scroll (and allies) can attack any realm without flying. (Def)

name: Map of Life
text: No player can play a realm or rebuild a realm until this player's next turn.

name: Supernatural Chill
text: Unnatural winter strips 2 levels from every champion and ally until this player's next turn. Any card reduced to level 0 is discarded immediately.

name: Map to a Mercenary Army
text: Offensive wizard spells have their levels (if any) halved (rounding up) when used against this ally.

name: Pit Trap!
text: Traps a winning champion so a realm is not razed. The champion is discarded as if he had lost the battle.

name: Mind Flayer Lord
text: The illithid immediately destroys all opposing allies of level 3 or less. The illithid can only be joined by allies of at least level 4.

name: Aurak Draconian Lord
text: If the aurak is defeated, it also forces the champion who killed it to be discarded.

name: Ego Coin
text: A champion with this coin can have any number of attached artifacts, and of any world. (Def)

name: Chest of Many Things
text: The champion with this chest can fly, and can function as a hero, wizard, cleric, or monster; the player chooses which type of champion before each round. (Def)

name: Gelatinous Cube
text: If the opposing champion loses in combat, his attachments are transferred to the cube. It receives all bonuses from the items while under its control. When the cube is defeated, the cards go to their owner's discard pile.

name: Gatekeeper
text: Immune to events and offensive spells. Can be sent to the Abyss to send home all champions (champions return to the player's hand).

name: Age of Entropy
text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. At the end of each player's turn (after discarding down to maximum hand size), that player must discard a card from his hand or pool, or raze a realm.

name: Orb of Green Dragonkind
text: Once per turn can duplicate the level and special powers of any dragon in play. The orb cannot be used again until the player's next turn.

name: The Undead Htimsen
text: Undead. Flyer. If played between 6 PM and 6 AM his level rises to 10. Spiritual kin to the Gib Htimsen, this vampire automatically defeats psionicists.

name: Tapestry of the Stag
text: This player's champions are immune to the special powers (but not the levels) of all Ravenloft champions and allies.

name: Dori the Barbarian's Cape
text: Champion cannot be discarded by harmful events, offensive spells, or psionic powers. Once per turn, he can cancel one helpful event played. He must attack every turn, if possible, or be discarded.

name: Weasel Attack!
text: When attacking, this player can choose an opponent's champion to take his champion's place in combat. That player must fight with his own cards. If he wins, the realm is automatically razed; both he and the event player draw spoils. If he loses, his champion is discarded and his foremost realm is razed; the event player draws spoils. (Harmful)

name: The Barbarian's Decree
text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. The glory of combat demands that all players attack each turn (if possible). Any who do not must discard down to 5 cards at the end of their turn. Those who do attack are rewarded by the gods: Their champions may attack twice each round unless defeated in combat or the realm is razed.

name: The Abyssal Vortex
text: Played at the beginning of the player's turn, this card is not discarded. It affects all players and remains in effect until any other rule card is played. Wish and Limited Wish spells cannot be cast. All spells and allies played while this card is in effect are discarded into the Abyss.

name: Prismal the Outrageous
text: Can cast wizard and cleric spells and is immune to offensive magical items. Prismal and his allies can attack any Forgotten Realms realm, regardless of position or powers, and he gains two spoils of victory if he razes it.

name: Malatra, the Living Jungle
text: Malatra can defend itself as a level 6 monster. It cannot be attacked by any champion or ally that is a swimmer. The level of attacking champions and allies that are not flyers is halved.

name: Mayor Charles Oliver O'Kane
text: His allure and charm are beyond compare, and all female heroes, wizards, and clerics who face him in battle return to their pools, defeated. He gains 3 levels when defending a Forgotten Realms realm.

name: Bengoukee the Witch Doctor
text: Can cast wizard and cleric spells and is immune to all spells cast in phase 3. Phase 4 spells cast by the witch doctor are at twice the level bonus.

name: Big Chief Bagoomba
text: Bagoomba is a figurehead of great charisma. When defending, the levels of his allies are doubled, and opposing allies of level 3 or less cannot be played.

name: The Genie Bottle
text: All spells in play are dispelled, including a just-cast spell, and all holdings and rule cards are removed from play. Can be Calmed by individual players but cannot be canceled. (Harmful)

name: Estate Transference
text: This spell places a realm and any attached holding in the Abyss. If spell-turned or reflected, the caster of this spell is placed in the Abyss. This player can make no attacks this turn. Limit one per deck. (Off/3)

name: Starshine
text: Starshine and her allies can attack any realm regardless of its position or powers. If defeated, she can be placed beneath a realm to duplicate the effects of any opposing holding in play.

name: The Starving Artist
text: If on the losing side of a battle, no one gains a spoils of victory, and one opponent (this player's choice) must discard his hand down to two.

name: The King of the Elves
text: Automatically defeats any wizard played against him but is instantly defeated by an undead champion. If defeated in battle, all wizards of base level 7 or higher are discarded from every player's pool.

name: Sakornia
text: Sakornia gains 3 additional levels when using an artifact.

name: Edormira, Red Dragon
text: Flyer. No monster can defend against Edormira.

name: Gloriana
text: Gloriana can cause a gust of wind to blow all flyers out of battle; no flyers can be played against her.

name: Gib Ekim
text: Gib can fight as either a wizard (5) or a hero (7); the player must choose at the start of the round.

name: Neirgral, Green Dragon
text: Flyer. Neirgral is so frightening that no allies of level 4 or less can be played on either side.

name: Dagaronzie, Green Dragon
text: Flyer. Dagaronzie can instantly destroy any two allies played against it in a round of battle.

name: Fejyelsae
text: If any allies are played with Fejuelsae, she drops to level 7.

name: Dragon Rage!
text: All creatures fear the dragon rage! Every player must discard one champion from his hand or pool.

name: Shalbaal, Red Dragon
text: Flyer. Every time Shalbaal wins a round of battle, the player randomly draws one card from the defeated player's hand and discards it. The player must laugh while doing this.

name: Delsenora
text: Delsenora is also an oracle. She can cancel the effect of one event card for this player, but must be discarded afterward.

name: Gib Evets
text: This creature is so magic-resistant that magical items and spells have no effect against it; only artifacts can hurt it.

name: Dori the Barbarian
text: Dori gains 2 levels when fighting a cleric or a wizard.

name: Gib Htimsen
text: The nether monstrosity is immune to all spells, events, magical items, and artifacts.

name: Darbee
text: Darbee gains 4 levels when fighting a monster.

name: Aurum, Gold Dragon
text: Flyer. Aurum gains 1 extra level per friendly ally (in addition to the ally's bonus).

name: Halcyon
text: Every time Halcyon wins a round of battle, the player can return one card from the discard pile to his hand.

name: Stryck
text: When Stryck attacks, she gets to pick her opponent from those champions in the defender's pool.

name: Alicia
text: Alicia's protective spells give her complete immunity against magical items; opponents' magical items have no effect.

name: Red Zeb
text: No allies of level 3 or less can be played against the horrid Zeb.

name: The Avatar
text: The Avatar instantly destroys all undead champions and/or allies.

name: Smolder, Red Dragon
text: Flyer. If Smolder loses a round of battle, he destroys one of his owner's holdings for revenge.

name: Lovely Colleen
text: All monsters are awed by her beauty. Colleen wins the round automatically if the opposing champion is a monster.

name: Ember, the Red Dragon
text: Flyer. If Ember is defeated, the victor can draw two spoils of victory cards (the dragon's hoard).

name: Andra the Wise
text: Andra carries an enchanted staff that prevents any undead allies from being played against her.

name: Karm, Black Dragon
text: Flyer. Karm can cast wizard spells but is excessively proud; no allies can be played to aid him.
